transcript: - Hey, guys, it's Justine, and today, we have the new Samsung 8K QLED TV. This is the 82-inch version. We saw this at CES, this year, and it was absolutely amazing, and guess what. It is here, and we are about to unbox it. Side note, it's really heavy. Could we just, this doesn't even span the length of my arms. (bright music) Let's unbox. This is so huge, and this isn't even the biggest version that they have. The biggest version is a 98-inch model. They also have a 65, a 75 and an 85, and this is somewhere sort of in the middle. This is the 82-inch. I hope that the TV stand that I got is big enough. You guys know how I am with measuring. I'm also really excited to try this, because it has something called 8K AI Upscaling. Now I don't shoot my content in 8K just yet, but with the 8K AI Upscaling, it ensures that my content looks amazing, even if it isn't 8K. I'm gonna let this go, and it's gonna just be like a big reveal. (Justine gasps) (Justine sighs) There's a lot of stuff going on. Let me resort back to my manual (chuckles). Wow. Oh, these are the legs. All right, I'm gonna get these legs on this thing, and then we're gonna set it up on the TV stand and get it all set up. (dramatic music) A good day, friend - Goodness. I wish that all of you guys were here, right now, in this room, witnessing what I'm witnessing right now. - Hello, and we're all good. (Justine gasps) - We're in. So here's ambient mode. This is kinda cool, because usually, if your screen is off, it'll just be a black screen, which is kinda boring. But this has all kinds of really cool things. You can add things like the weather or the time or latest news headlines. Listen. (water pattering) I feel like I'm in the tub right now. These look so good, wow! Anytime I'm done editing a video, I love to see what it looks like on a television, and now this is so easy to do, because with AirPlay 2, all I have to do is, I can export my video, and then I'm just gonna share it, using AirPlay 2, and like magic, it's on your TV. AirPlay 2 support isn't just in this TV. It is available as a firmware upgrade to 2018 Samsung Smart TVs, and it's kind of crazy, because this is available in 190 countries, worldwide. It is the first to have the Apple TV app integrated in the TV platform. No external hardware is needed. And the new app brings over 100,000 movies and TV shows, and you can subscribe to premium channels like HBO and Showtime. And you can even AirPlay music. I have an incredible royalty-free track here, prepared just for you. ("Bombs Away") You can also share YouTube videos, much like this video from CES, where I'm actually looking at this TV, in Vegas. Here, it's showing you how we're able to use AI and upscale content. So content that is not ready for 8K televisions-- Did you hear what Justine, several months ago, just said? So you can be anywhere in the room and still have a perfect view of the screen.
